attributes.action: Lower the cost of University education.
attributes.additional_details: The Government should reduce the tuition fees of University students who have had their studies adversely affected by Covid 19.
attributes.background: Currently, most university's charge the maximum tuition fee of £9,250 per year. With the interruption of Covid and irregularity of studies, most courses have not been able to offer the full support or education that they usually do. Students have been restricted and should be compensated for this.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Require universities to partially refund tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/324762

Require universities to fully refund tuition fees for the Autumn term: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555583

Lower university tuition fees for students until online teaching ends: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552911

Government subsidise this year's university tuition fees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552814

Refund ALL University student tuition fees due to lack of quality in education: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555516

Reduce student loan debts by the cost of all tuition fees paid during Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560953
